Title: Meet in the Middle
Description: You are given an array of n numbers. In how many ways can you choose a subset of the numbers with sum x?
Input Specification:
The first input line has two numbers n and x: the array size and the required sum. 
 The second line has n integers t_1,t_2,\dots,t_n: the numbers in the array.
Output Specification: Print the number of ways you can create the sum x.
